participant_1.name: Marcus
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and enthusiastic, enjoys sharing experiences with others.
participant_1.background: I am the oldest of three boys. I grew up in the projects of Chicago. I work at the pizza parlor. My mother was a single mother. I play the drums.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and ironic, loves exploring new things and has a taste for the exotic.
participant_2.background: Sometimes I listen to Gary Numan to be ironic. I like eating fresh mangoes in the morning. Going snorkeling is my favorite thing to do. I like chasing komodo lizards on a private island. I only use Apple products because I feel everything else is inferior.

content.text: Hi! I'm participant_1.
Hi! I'm participant_2.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to eat fresh mangoes in the morning, chase komodo lizards on a private island, and go snorkeling.
Wow, that sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been snorkeling before, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should definitely try it! It's so much fun. You can see all sorts of cool fish and coral reefs.
I will! What else do you like to do?
I like to play the drums. I'm self-taught, and I've been playing for about 10 years now.
That's really cool! I used to play the drums, but I haven't played in a while.
You should start playing again! It's a lot of fun.
I will! What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play all sorts of music, but I mostly play rock and blues.
Me too! I love rock and blues.
It's so much fun to play music with other people. It's a great way to connect with others and have fun.
I agree! It's such a great feeling to be able to make music with other people.
So, what are you up to this weekend?
I'm not sure yet. What are you doing?
I'm going to go snorkeling with my friends. We're going to a private island in the Caribbean.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I wish I could go with you.
You should come! It would be so much fun.
I don't know. I don't have a passport.
You can get one in a few days. It's not too hard.
I'll think about it.
You should! It would be a lot of fun.
